name: Potential Waveedit.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "waveedit.dll", which is part of the Nero WaveEditor audio editing software.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection: {"ImageLoaded|endswith": "\\waveedit.dll"}
filter_main_legit_path: {"Image": ["C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Nero\\Nero Apps\\Nero WaveEditor\\waveedit.exe", "C:\\Program Files\\Nero\\Nero Apps\\Nero WaveEditor\\waveedit.exe"], "ImageLoaded|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Nero\\Nero Apps\\Nero WaveEditor\\", "C:\\Program Files\\Nero\\Nero Apps\\Nero WaveEditor\\"]}
